input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Redux Speed Men's Sleek Cut Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Paws Forma Slim Fit Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Rocket Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Pro Thermal Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Jersey Man Santini Eco Sleek Bengal Short Sleeve'
  - Name='Santini Delta Line Tech T-shirt'
  - Name='Santini Sensation Unisex Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Women's Quest Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Santini RTR long sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Castelli Ruota Jersey FZ'
  - Name='Sportful Supergiara Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Quest Long-Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Transfer Mesh Short Sleeve Baselayer'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Quest Barrier Convertible Cycling Jacket'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Pro Barrier Jacket Men's'
  - Name='Man Sportful Cliff Supergiara Jersey'
  - Name='Man Sportful Supergiara Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Merino Wool MTB Shirt'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Lightweight Mesh Cycling Base Layer'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Trail-Ready & Quick-Dry MTB Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Long Sleeve Durable MTB Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Columbine Men's Moisture-Wicking Mesh Cycling Base Layer'
  - Name='Pactimo Summer Sleeves'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Moisture-Wicking Mesh Cycling Base Layer'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Bib Shorts'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Redux Speed Men's Sleek Cut Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This competitor product is a men's sleek cut jersey likely designed for cycling, very similar to the reference Core Jersey in function and style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Paws Forma Slim Fit Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A slim fit jersey from Santini, probably cycling specific, sharing the jersey category and likely similar fabric and fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Rocket Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A jersey intended for cycling from Sportful, closely matching the reference in purpose, features, and fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Pro Thermal Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Although a cycling jersey, this one is thermal and long sleeve, differing in construction and seasonality from the short sleeve lightweight reference jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Jersey Man Santini Eco Sleek Bengal Short Sleeve
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A short sleeve sleek fit jersey from Santini, eco likely referring to sustainable materials, similar to the core jersey's design and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Delta Line Tech T-shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A technical t-shirt rather than a cycling jersey, so it lacks cycling-specific features like pockets but may share moisture-wicking fabric.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Sensation Unisex Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unisex short sleeve cycling jersey, very similar in function, fit, and features to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Women's Quest Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A women's cycling jersey similar in function and construction, though potentially differing in cut and fit intended for women.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini RTR long sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve cycling jersey, similar fabric and features but differs in sleeve length and possibly intended seasonal use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Ruota Jersey FZ
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A full-zip cycling jersey from Castelli, closely matching the core jersey's key features and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Supergiara Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-performance cycling jersey matching the core jersey in cut, fabric technology, and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Quest Long-Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve recycling jersey, similar in materials and purpose but different in sleeve length.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Transfer Mesh Short Sleeve Baselayer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A base layer, not a jersey, designed to be worn under jerseys, thus less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Quest Barrier Convertible Cycling Jacket
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A cycling jacket with convertible elements, dissimilar in core construction and silhouette to a jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Pro Barrier Jacket Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A cycling jacket, outerwear rather than a jersey, with different materials and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Man Sportful Cliff Supergiara Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey with similar features and cut, very relevant to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Man Sportful Supergiara Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Nearly identical product category and likely similar construction and features as reference jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Merino Wool MTB Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: MTB specific shirt with merino wool, likely heavier and different fabric construction than the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Lightweight Mesh Cycling Base Layer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Base layer rather than an outer jersey, serving a different purpose despite cycling use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Trail-Ready & Quick-Dry MTB Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: MTB jersey with quick-dry properties, similar category but potentially different fit and heavier construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Long Sleeve Durable MTB Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve MTB jersey, similar in some features but differing in sleeve length and possibly durability focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Columbine Men's Moisture-Wicking Mesh Cycling Base Layer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A mesh cycling base layer, distinct from a jersey in function and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Summer Sleeves
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These are arm sleeves accessory rather than a jersey, vastly different product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Moisture-Wicking Mesh Cycling Base Layer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Base layer rather than jersey, intended to be worn under jerseys, thus different purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling bib shorts, different apparel category and function than the jersey.
